Sara Ali Khan Eating An Enormous Dosa With Mom Amrita Singh Is All Of Us Going Overboard On Cheat Days

Sara Ali Khan Eating An Enormous Dosa With Mom Amrita Singh Is All Of Us Going Overboard On Cheat Days

Don’t you all eagerly wait for the cheat day in the entire week when you follow a strict diet plan on the other days. Most of us go overboard on cheat days, don’t we? I mean, is it even possible to take control of a cheat day and not kill the progress you’ve made so far.

Sara Ali Khan and mom Amrita Singh are just like us. Sara, who is busy shooting for her next movie Coolie no. 1, a remake of Govinda and Karisma Kapoor’s classic film, took some time out from her busy schedule to bond with mommy. And they both showed us the joy of bonding over food.

Twitter

For their cheat meal, they ordered an enormous Dosa. Amrita Singh was a little embarrassed. So much so, she hide her face from the camera as Sara pokes fun at her and asks “Hi mom we’re live on Instagram. Why are you eating like this today? What’s gone wrong?”

Don't Miss 289 SHARES 8.8 K SHARES 5 K SHARES 1.9 K SHARES

She is of course referring to the huge Dosa that is placed on the table. “When mommy and I set out to eat, We don’t care about the diet-only cheat, Eating like this isn’t extraordinary it’s no feat, Even food competitors should shut up and give us their seat! #KushtiKiTayari #bharisawari #merimapyaari #sarakishayari,” she wrote as she posted the video on Instagram. But did you guys finish the meal?

Sara isn’t the only one. Kartik Aaryan sometime ago couldn’t control himself from eating sinfully delicious Kachoris in Lucknow. He was surrounded by so many fans as he stepped out to eat Kachoris from a local vendor. One of the fans even told him that he shouldn’t be eating Kachoris as they are too “oily” and that his “skin kharab ho jayegi”. But he tells them that his skin will instead glow. Watch in the video below.

What are you planning to eat on your next cheat day? Tell us in the comments section below.
